Name: Houdini's Castle
About the game: SOLVE THE MYSTERIES OF HOUDINI'S CASTLE Beautiful Hidden Object Game Play Combined with Mysterious Adventure! All Ages Game Play! Your honeymoon is cut short when your plane crashes on an uncharted island. You awake to discover a madman has kidnapped your husband. To get him back, you'll have to use all your wits to pass his sinister tests and solve the mysteries of Houdini's Castle. Along the way, you'll uncover Houdini's secret past and learn about the brilliant apprentice who changed his life. Can you expose Houdini's greatest trick to save your husband and escape the island?
